title: AWS Greengrass
description: AWS Greengrass seamlessly extends AWS onto physical devices so they can act locally on the data they generate, while still using the cloud for management, analytics, and durable storage. AWS Greengrass ensures your devices can respond quickly to local events and operate with intermittent connectivity. AWS Greengrass minimizes the cost of transmitting data to the cloud by allowing you to author AWS Lambda functions that execute locally.

actions.title: ListCoreDefinitions
actions.description: Retrieves a list of core definitions.

actions.title: UpdateCoreDefinition
actions.description: Updates a core definition.

actions.title: ListCoreDefinitionVersions
actions.description: Lists versions of a core definition.

actions.title: GetCoreDefinitionVersion
actions.description: Retrieves information about a core definition version.

actions.title: ListDeviceDefinitions
actions.description: Retrieves a list of device definitions.

actions.title: UpdateDeviceDefinition
actions.description: Updates a device definition.

actions.title: ListDeviceDefinitionVersions
actions.description: Lists the versions of a device definition.

actions.title: GetDeviceDefinitionVersion
actions.description: Retrieves information about a device definition version.

actions.title: ListFunctionDefinitions
actions.description: Retrieves a list of Lambda function definitions.

actions.title: UpdateFunctionDefinition
actions.description: Updates a Lambda function definition.

actions.title: ListFunctionDefinitionVersions
actions.description: Lists the versions of a Lambda function definition.

actions.title: GetFunctionDefinitionVersion
actions.description: Retrieves information about a Lambda function definition version, such as which Lambda functions are included in the version and their configurations.

actions.title: ListLoggerDefinitions
actions.description: Retrieves a list of logger definitions.

actions.title: UpdateLoggerDefinition
actions.description: Updates a logger definition.

actions.title: ListLoggerDefinitionVersions
actions.description: Lists the versions of a logger definition.

actions.title: GetLoggerDefinitionVersion
actions.description: Retrieves information about a logger definition version.

actions.title: ListSubscriptionDefinitions
actions.description: Retrieves a list of subscription definitions.

actions.title: UpdateSubscriptionDefinition
actions.description: Updates a subscription definition.

actions.title: ListSubscriptionDefinitionVersions
actions.description: Lists the versions of a subscription definition.

actions.title: GetSubscriptionDefinitionVersion
actions.description: Retrieves information about a subscription definition version.

actions.title: ListGroups
actions.description: Retrieves a list of groups.

actions.title: UpdateGroup
actions.description: Updates a group.

actions.title: ListGroupCertificateAuthorities
actions.description: Retrieves the current CAs for a group.

actions.title: UpdateGroupCertificateConfiguration
actions.description: Updates the Cert expiry time for a group.

actions.title: GetGroupCertificateAuthority
actions.description: Retreives the CA associated with a group. Returns the public key of the CA.

actions.title: ListDeployments
actions.description: Returns a history of deployments for the group.

actions.title: GetDeploymentStatus
actions.description: Returns the status of a deployment.

actions.title: GetAssociatedRole
actions.description: Retrieves the role associated with a particular group.

actions.title: ListGroupVersions
actions.description: List the versions of a group.

actions.title: GetGroupVersion
actions.description: Retrieves information about a group version.

actions.title: GetServiceRoleForAccount
actions.description: Retrieves the service role that is attached to the account.

actions.title: UpdateConnectivityInfo
actions.description: Updates the connectivity information for the core. Any devices that belong to the group which has this core will receive this information in order to find the location of the core and connect to it.
